name: aerisi-kalinoth-pota
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of aerisi-kalinoth-pota, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of aerisi-kalinoth-pota with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Create a heroic tabletop fantasy concept art, with grounded medieval gear devoid of modern technology. The artwork should be in a consistent painterly style with an emphasis on the character's musculature and unique limbs. The character should be placed in an underwater and sky merged zone, portraying a sense of movement. The scene should mimic aquatic realism with elements such as subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, and pressure-dome materials. There should be a human silhouette present in the image. Pay attention to detail, from the character's gear to the surrounding environment. The color palette should include teals, deep blues, sea-greens, with touches of pearl highlights. The image should maintain a specified aspect/resolution, avoiding artifacts. It should not include modern signage, photorealistic CGI, or anime style elements. Avoid including embedded text or words unless specified; and there should be no gibberish strings or meaningless symbols. However, numbered pins might be utilized.
